summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the federal Justice Assistance Grant (JAG) program; authorizing the execution of agreements under which the City will receive financial assistance from the US Department of Justice (DOJ), Bureau of Justice Assistance (BJA); authorizing an application for allocation of funds under those agreements; accepting the money when received; and increasing appropriations to the Seattle Police Department, Seattle Municipal Court, Human Services Department and the Office of Policy and Management in the 2008 Budget; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Public Safety, Human Services, and Education
